about.introduction: Hey there! I am Ahmed, a frontend developer with 8 years of experience designing and building immersive 2D and 3D user interfaces. This strong foundation made my transition into the XR world seamless, allowing me to quickly adapt and create stunning, interactive applications that push the boundaries of digital experiences. By combining aesthetic precision with cutting-edge technology, I bring ideas to life in ways that feel natural, engaging, and future-ready. Let’s explore how innovation in XR can transform the way we interact with technology!

experience.headline: Work Experience
experience.subHeadline: What I Have Done So Far

points.point1: Developed and deployed responsive web and mobile applications using React and React Native, optimizing performance across iOS, Android, and modern browsers.
points.point2: Integrated RESTful APIs and GraphQL endpoints with dynamic state management using Redux, Context API, and custom hooks.
points.point3: Led front-end testing initiatives with Jest and React Testing Library, ensuring 95%+ code coverage and smooth CI/CD pipelines.
points.point4: Translated complex UI/UX designs into pixel-perfect components using Styled Components, Tailwind CSS, and React Navigation

points.point1: Reduced manual workload by 60% by building a tool for bulk editing and comparison of thousands of test files.
points.point2: Accelerated config updates by 70% and cut human error with a Python script automating test bench workflow.

points.point1: I lead the architecture and development of comprehensive software solutions tailored for educational institutions across the globe. My focus spans the full lifecycle of our core platforms—EduSync LMS, a robust Learning Management System, and EduSync SMS, a complete School Management System—each designed to adapt to the diverse needs of various educational systems worldwide.
points.point2: From product strategy and technical oversight to ensuring scalability and adaptability, I drive the vision behind creating intelligent, user-centric platforms that simplify and enhance the educational experience for students, educators, and administrators alike.

points.point1: Built high-performance, SEO-optimized, multilingual web applications using Next.js, leveraging server-side rendering (SSR) and static site generation (SSG).
points.point2: Integrated dynamic APIs and third-party services with middleware, routing, and API routes for scalable backend logic
points.point3: Designed modular, reusable components with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and React Query for clean architecture.
points.point4: Incremental and full migration from pages router architecture to app router architecture powered by React Server Components.

points.point1: Developed immersive XR experiences using Unity, WebXR, and Three.js, tailored for Meta Quest and browser-based platforms.
points.point2: Implemented spatial interactions, gesture recognition, and physics-based environments for realistic user engagement.
points.point3: Integrated XR content with backend systems using Firebase, GraphQL, and real-time data streams.
points.point4: Delivered cross-platform prototypes for AR, VR, and MR, optimizing performance across mobile, headset, and desktop devices.

projects.introduction: Real-world challenges sharpen more than just skills — they shape perspective. Each project reflects not only technical growth, but strategic thinking under pressure. From concept to deployment, I’ve learned that execution teaches what theory can’t. This section showcases the practical journey behind the knowledge I bring forward.

3dPortfolio.name: Multilingual 3D-Portfolio
3dPortfolio.description1: The 3D portfolio demonstrates advanced knowledge in immersive environments and animation. Smooth transitions and carefully orchestrated motion highlight strong command of modern frameworks. The result is an engaging, visually striking experience that blends technical precision with creative design. Its multilingual implementation further underlines attention to accessibility and inclusivity, ensuring the work resonates across diverse audiences.
3dPortfolio.description2: This interactive web portfolio is built with Next.js, React Three Fiber, and Framer Motion, showcasing dynamic 3D scenes and smooth transitions. It highlights my ability to craft immersive user experiences using WebGL-powered components, real-time animations, and spatial storytelling — all optimized for performance and responsiveness.

iphone15replica.name: iPhone 15 Replica
iphone15replica.description1: A pixel-perfect recreation of the iPhone 15 website, meticulously crafted to showcase fluid animations and a responsive design. This project highlights a deep understanding of modern web development, blending stunning visuals with a seamless user experience, powered by cutting-edge technologies.
iphone15replica.description2: Built with Next.js for optimal performance and SEO, styled with Tailwind CSS for rapid and consistent UI development, and enhanced with TypeScript for robust code quality. Dynamic and engaging animations are brought to life using GSAP, delivering an interactive and visually rich browsing experience that mirrors Apple's iconic design.

3DProductModeling.name: AI Powered 3D Product Modeling
3DProductModeling.description1: A versatile 3D product modeling platform designed for e-commerce, enabling businesses to showcase their products with interactive, high-fidelity 3D models. This project integrates cutting-edge web technologies to deliver a seamless user experience, allowing for dynamic product visualization and customization. It also explores the innovative use of Large Language Models (LLMs) to generate unique textual logos or textures directly onto 3D models, offering unparalleled personalization.
3DProductModeling.description2: Built on Next.js for optimal performance and SEO, styled with Tailwind CSS for a sleek, responsive interface. The core 3D rendering is powered by Three.js, while GSAP orchestrates fluid, engaging animations. This combination creates an immersive viewing experience, further enhanced by the experimental LLM integration that allows for on-the-fly generation of custom text-based designs, pushing the boundaries of interactive product presentation.

showroom.name: VR Showroom
showroom.description1: Step into an immersive 3D Gaming Room, a virtual showroom meticulously crafted to demonstrate cutting-edge XR skills within a web context. This experience leverages the power of WebXR to transport users into a captivating VR world, showcasing interactive environments and advanced spatial design.
showroom.description2: Built on Next.js for optimal performance and SEO, this VR showroom utilizes Three.js to render stunning 3D graphics and intricate environments. It highlights my expertise in creating seamless, high-fidelity virtual reality experiences directly in the browser, pushing the boundaries of web-based XR applications.

helloXR.name: Hello XR
helloXR.description1: Dive into 'Hello XR,' a captivating WebXR application designed to showcase intuitive hand-tracking interactions within immersive virtual and augmented realities. This project allows users to sculpt and manipulate dynamic particle systems with their own hands, demonstrating a seamless blend of physical gesture and digital response.
helloXR.description2: Crafted with WebXR, this experience pushes the boundaries of interactive design, offering a tangible demonstration of my expertise in creating responsive, hand-controlled environments. It highlights the potential of natural user interfaces in VR/AR, transforming abstract concepts into engaging, haptic-like interactions.

testimonial1.name: Michael
testimonial1.body: Ahmed was always up to date with the latest technology and incorporated current developments into the project in a meaningful way. He was able to integrate fixes and new features cleanly without causing any unwanted side effects. He didn't just work through tasks, he proactively contributed to the modernization of the code base. His micro-leadership style empowered junior developers to contribute confidently, making him a clear technical asset to any development team.

testimonial2.name: C.W
testimonial2.body: Ahmed structures complex development projects efficiently and purposefully. He is a team player who actively supports colleagues and contributes to constructive and solution-oriented collaboration. He quickly grasps new topics and technologies and applies this knowledge proactively when implementing projects. His analytical approach and attention to detail make him a reliable and technically skilled asset in IT development projects.

testimonial3.name: Andreas
testimonial3.body: During his time at NXP, Ahmed showed outstanding initiative in coordinating cross-functional tasks. He was instrumental in keeping our roadmap on track and fostering collaboration between frontend and backend teams. His leadership was subtle but highly effective.
